analysis.key_quote: Imposing political tests without public discussion of priorities on what science to support and what not to support will have the effect of decreasing the productivity of our scientists and endanger the our future leading role in worldwide scientific progress.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses strong concerns about the politicization of scientific funding and decision-making, emphasizing the importance of merit-based support for research. This aligns with opposition to the proposed rule, which could undermine scientific integrity and lead to political interference.
